about_the_game:
This bundle contains

  • 3 days of WoT Premium Account
  • 150,000 credits
  • 3 Large Repair Kits
  • 3 Large First Aid Kits
  • 3 Automatic Fire Extinguishers

Bundle description:

Grab a bunch of useful resources with the Free Supplies Pack. This DLC contains days of WoT Premium Account to speed up your progress in the game, a set of large consumables that will come in handy during heated battles, and some credits for your needs.


Consumables. Large Repair Kit will instantly fix all the damaged modules of your tank at once so that you can rush back into action. Large First Aid Kit will heal all currently injured crew members and remove the stun effect caused by artillery shells. Automatic Fire Extinguisher will automatically put out a fire if you happen to catch one—you won’t even need to press a button!

Credits. Credits are the main in-game currency. You can spend credits on new modules, equipment, and vehicles. Credits are also used to repair vehicles after battle, purchase crew directives, and resupply ammunition and consumables.

Premium Account. When you have an active WoT Premium Account, you get a lot of extra benefits that accelerate your progress and make the game even more enjoyable, such as the following:
  • Bonuses: WoT Premium Account provides a +50% bonus to Combat XP, Crew XP, and credits earned in battle.
  • Applicable modifier to XP: Apply an additional ×3 multiplier to XP earned in your latest victorious Random Battle five times per day.
  • Credit Reserve: Receive an extra bonus of up to 750,000 credits within seven days. Also, a 10% bonus to credits earned goes into a special vault.
  • Premium missions: Owners of WoT Premium Account will have the opportunity to fulfill a series of three simple daily missions.
  • Platoon bonus: In a Platoon, WoT Premium Account holders receive a 15% credit bonus. Also, fellow Platoon members who are not holders receive a 10% bonus.
  • You also receive one more slot for excluded maps.

This DLC can be added to your World of Tanks account only once.
You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

name: World of Tanks — Free Supplies Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 4550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 – 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Desktop)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 70 GB available space

short_description: Grab a bunch of useful resources with the Free Supplies Pack. This DLC contains days of WoT Premium Account to speed up your progress in the game, a set of large consumables that will come in handy during heated battles, and some credits for your needs.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Czech*, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian, Russian*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
